result.eng: I like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom bricfeasta mór a iṫe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.eng: The murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.

result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: The company was at the vanguard in the computer industry.

result.eng: We had difficulties at the start.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: The Irish language always has prirority.
